Article Title: India‚Äôs 2nd spaceport in TN will see first SSLV launch in 2027: Isro chief; says Centre has given nod for Chandrayaan-5
Article Text:
.

NEW DELHI: Isro‚Äôs second spaceport outside Andhra Pradesh‚Äôs Sriharikota, which is coming up at Kulasekarapattinam coastal town in Tamil Nadu‚Äôs Thoothukudi district, will see its maiden launch of a small satellite launch vehicle (SSLV) or mini-PSLV within 24 months, space agency chairman V Narayanan said on Monday. The new spaceport will enhance India‚Äôs capabilities in space launch services.‚ÄúAll facilities will be commissioned for launch in 24 months. The first launch will take place in two years. Don‚Äôt think it will be literally small in size. It will be a 500 kg satellite,‚Äù Narayanan said in Chennai after inaugurating a new research centre, ‚ÄòS Ramakrishnan Centre of Excellence for Research in Fluid and Thermal Science,' at IIT-Madras.In another big development, the Isro chairman on Sunday said the Centre has given approval for the ambitious Chandrayaan-5 mission as part of the country‚Äôs long-term goal of landing an Indian on the Moon by 2040. He highlighted the growing scope of India‚Äôs lunar exploration and the significance of Chandrayaan-5, which will feature a higher-capacity lander, essential for future missions, including potential human landings on the Moon.He said Chandrayaan-4 will focus on landing and collecting samples from the Moon, while Chandrayaan-5, which received approval just days ago, will deploy a 350 kg rover. This mission is part of a collaboration between India and Japan.During this year, Isro has planned a series of launches, including GSLV, a commercial satellite from the US, and unmanned test mission with humanoid as part of the Gaganyaan mission, Narayanan said.PM Modi had remotely laid the foundation stone for Kulasekharapattinam spaceport on Feb 28, 2024. The selection of this TN spaceport offers strategic advantages, particularly in enhancing payload capability with its direct southward launch trajectory for small launch vehicles. The new spaceport will house 35 facilities, including a launchpad, rocket integration facilities, ground range and checkout facilities, and a mobile launch structure (MLS) with checkout computers. It will have the capacity to launch 24 satellites every year using a mobile launch structure.Spread over 2,350 acres, the Kulasekharapatnam spaceport will help save fuel for small rocket launches as the port can launch rockets directly south over the Indian Ocean without requiring crossing landmasses.
Article Summary: Kulasekarapattinam coastal town in tamil nadu‚Äôs thoothukudi district will see its maiden launch of a small satellite launch vehicle (sslv) or mini-pslv within 24 months, space agency chairman v narayanan said. The new spaceport will enhance india's capabilities in space launch services.

Article Title: Hyperloop India: India to have ‚Äòworld‚Äôs longest hyperloop tube soon‚Äô: Vaishnaw shares video
Article Text:
India to have ‚Äòworld‚Äôs longest hyperloop tube soon‚Äô: Vaishnaw shares video

NEW DELHI: Union minister Ashwini Vaishnaw announced on Sunday that the Hyperloop project at the Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Madras will feature Asia‚Äôs longest Hyperloop tube, measuring 410 metres.He also said that the project is on track to become the world's longest Hyperloop tube soon.Vaishnaw, who holds the portfolios of railways, information & broadcasting, and information technology, inspected the project during his short visit to Chennai on March 15.Sharing a video of his visit, he posted on social media, ‚ÄúLongest Hyperloop tube in Asia (410 meters)... soon to be the world's longest @iitmadras.‚ÄùHyperloop technology is considered the fifth mode of transportation, involving high-speed pods travelling in a near-vacuum tube. By reducing air resistance, these pods can achieve speeds of over 1,000 km per hour, revolutionising future transportation.According to Vaishnaw, India is making significant strides in Hyperloop technology, with the entire testing system being developed indigenously. The electronics components for the project will be developed at Chennai‚Äôs Integral Coach Factory, further strengthening India‚Äôs self-reliance in advanced transportation systems.The minister also highlighted that tests conducted so far had shown promising results, bringing the country closer to realising Hyperloop transportation.In May 2022, the ministry of railways approved an allocation of Rs 8.34 crore to IIT Madras for developing and validating the technology.
Article Summary: India to have ‚Äòworld‚Äôs longest hyperloop tube soon‚Äô: vaishnaw shares video of his visit to chennai. The hyperloop project at the indian institute of technology (iit) madras will feature asia's longest hyperloop tube, measuring 410 metres. In may 2022, the ministry of railways approved an allocation of rs 8.34 crore for developing and validating the technology.

Article Title: Join internship scheme, finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman urges industry, launches mobile app
Article Text: NEW DELHI: Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman on Monday appealed to India Inc to come forward and participate in Prime Minister Internship Scheme (PMIS) while launching a dedicated mobile application for candidates to access this scheme. She added the app will make the scheme more accessible for youths.Speaking to industry leaders and mediapersons, she said there is a need to give more confidence to youth while emphasising that there is no compulsion on industry and no interference. "You (industry) need to open the window... for people to have a peek," she said. The minister added that the scheme is for a national cause and Indian industry should participate in the larger interest.Sitharaman said the scheme helps youth, especially in tier-II and -III cities for better understanding of the job market, and the industry can contribute to the country and the economy by participating in the scheme. The minister also said that she has appealed to MPs to encourage youth to join the scheme.The FM also mentioned that there is a shortage of people in terms of industry expectations and requirements and the scheme is aimed at bridging that gap. According to Sitharaman, the scheme's website and app are being made more accessible with the app now available in various languages.The scheme, announced in the 2024-25 Budget, aims to provide internship opportunities to one crore youth in the top 500 companies in five years. Interns are provided monthly financial assistance of Rs 5,000 for 12 months and a one-time grant of Rs 6,000 under the scheme.Corporate affairs ministry secretary Deepti Gaur Mukherjee told reporters that about 1.15 lakh applicants had registered for the scheme and 2.4 lakh applications had been received.
Article Summary: Finance minister nirmala sitharaman appealed to india inc to come forward and participate in prime minister internship scheme. She added the app will make the scheme more accessible for youths. Interns are provided monthly financial assistance of rs 5,000 for 12 months and a one-time grant of rs 6,000 under the scheme.

Article Title: Stefon Diggs Instagram Photos: Stefon Diggs Brings Back All of His Buffalo Bills Photos on Instagram, Fueling Comeback Rumors
Article Text:
Photo by Omar Rawlings/Getty Images

back

Stefon Diggs Scrubbed the Bills From His IG‚ÄîNow They‚Äôre Back?

Reunion Incoming or Just a Nostalgia Trip?

Stefon Diggs hinting at return to Buffalo Bills? #buffalobills #billsmafia #stefondiggs #nflnews

‚ÄúAbsolutely no shot Stefon Diggs goes back to Buffalo lol‚Äù

‚ÄúIt‚Äôs giving desperateeeeeeü•±‚Äù

‚ÄúDidn't he burn whatever bridges he could find on his way out last time?‚Äù

Stefon Diggs has the internet doing double takes right now. The star wide receiver, who was traded from the Buffalo Bills to the Houston Texans this offseason, just put all his old Bills photoson Instagram. And if you know anything about social media tea, this kind of move isn‚Äôt just casual‚Äîfans are already losing their minds over what it could mean.When the Bills sent Diggs to the Texans in April, it didn‚Äôt seem like the smoothest of exits. The four-time Pro Bowler, who had been vocal about frustrations with the team in the past, wiped his Instagram clean of all things Buffalo. No posts, no memories‚Äîjust gone.Fast forward to now, and every single Bills-related photo has been restored. To make it even spicier, Diggs hasn‚Äôt said a word about it. No caption, no explanation‚Äîjust pure chaos for fans to interpret however they please.Theories are flying everywhere. Some die-hard Bills Mafia members are already manifesting his return, convinced that Diggs wants to undo the trade and come back to Buffalo. Others think it‚Äôs nothing more than a trip down memory lane, a way for him to acknowledge the good times without any actual football implications.Of course, there‚Äôs also the classic case of NFL players using cryptic social media moves to stir the pot. We‚Äôve seen it time and time again‚Äîscrub the team from your bio, post some vague emojis, send fans into a frenzy. Could Diggs be playing the same game?A user commented,Another user hinted at Diggs‚Äô desperation,Some feel that there is absolutely no scope of returning:Right now, he‚Äôs still a Houston Texan. But with social media antics like this, it‚Äôs impossible to ignore the speculation. Maybe he‚Äôs hinting at unfinished business in Buffalo. Maybe he‚Äôs just trolling. Either way, one thing‚Äôs for sure‚Äîthe NFL offseason drama never sleeps, and Stefon Diggs just made things a whole lot more interesting.Also read - The Internet‚Äôs Priceless Reaction to 72-Year-Old Bill Belichick‚Äôs Beach Pics With Jordon Hudson Is Too Good to Miss
Article Summary: Stefon diggs has the internet doing double takes. The star wide receiver was traded from the buffalo bills to the houston texans this offseason. Some die-hard bills mafia members are already manifesting his return. Others think it‚Äôs nothing more than a trip down memory lane.

Article Title: Fernando Tatis Jr. net worth 2025: Exploring Padres star‚Äôs fortune
Article Text:

Fernando Tatis Jr. is one of the richest baseball players. He recently bagged one of the biggest contracts, amounting to $340 million in history, and has his calendar filled with brand endorsement activities that add millions to his annual earnings.According to MLB records, the Padres‚Äô star was drafted by the Chicago White Sox in 2015 when he was picked from the Dominican Prospect League but was traded to the San Diego Padres in 2016, even before he hit the mound. The Padres accepted him in exchange for James Shields. He signed a contract worth $555,000 with the Padres in 2019. He received a hike with every new agreement, the latest blockbuster deal being a 14-year, $340 million bonanza.Let‚Äôs dive into the fortune wealth of the Padres‚Äô star to understand his income from salary and other resources.Fernando Tatis Jr.‚Äôs net worth in 2025 is estimated at around $340 million, thanks to his latest contract with the San Diego Padres. The team signed him for $555,000 in 2019 and increased the offer annually, and of course, by multiple factors.Tatis, who is 23 years old, has amassed a fortune and is considered a potential record-breaker in terms of salary when he joins the free agent market in 2035.His current contract of $340 million earns him a guaranteed average annual salary of $24.28 million. He received $10 million as a signing bonus on accepting the Padres‚Äô offer. The base salary component is $20 million, and the total salary is $20.71 million,According to an insider report by the East Village Times published in December 2024, a ‚Äòno-trade‚Äô clause in his current deal secures his future until 2035.An MLB Network Insider, Mark Feinsand‚Äôs tweet highlighted the complete breakdown of Fernando‚Äôs financial arrangement with the Padres. It read:Here's the breakdown of Fernando Tatis Jr.'s 14-year, $340M contract, per source:Fernando Tatis Jr. is one of the most marketable names in the baseball space. His on-field rampage turns the advertisers‚Äô heads, and they approach him with millions' worth of offers to sign him up as their poster boy. Some of the noticeable brands that he has lent his name include Gatorade, which signed a national endorsement deal with this sought-after star of the Padres; Hyperice, a recovery device expert; and Mizuno, a leading business in the gloves segment, to name a few.Although the public record of Tatis Jr.‚Äôs income from endorsements is not available, these add millions to his annual earnings.Fernando Tatis Jr. saw a rough patch in earnings when he tested positive for performance-enhancing substances that cost him a deal with Adidas , which maintains a strict stance against players who face such allegations.Fernando Tatis Jr. scored a .276 batting average off the 102 games he played in the 2024 season. His performance featured 21 homers, 49 RBIs, and 110 hits, proving his worth as one of the MVPs of the season.Fernando Tatis Jr., a Dominican Republican, participates in charitable initiatives that help him give back to his hometown. He regularly donates to causes that help needy people from his native place.He associated himself with a 24-carat gold limited edition eyewear development project, whose proceedings were pledged towards the Challenged Athletes Foundation, which helps challenged athletes to fulfill their sports dreams.As an extension to his profile as a philanthropist, he oversaw the ‚ÄòImpact the Dream‚Äô project that helped young ball players from the Caribbean and Central America to pursue their interest in the game.Also Read: Juan Soto reveals reason for crowning Fernando Tatis Jr. as ‚Äòbest player‚Äô in league
Article Summary: Fernando tatis jr‚Äôs net worth in 2025 is estimated at around $340 million, thanks to his latest contract with the san diego padres. The team signed him for $555,000 in 2019 and increased the offer annually. He received $10 million as a signing bonus on accepting the padres‚Äô offer.

Article Title: GTA 6 Delayed to 2026? Insider Leak Sparks Panic Among Fans!
Article Text:
Image via Rockstar

GTA 6 Is Delayed (Kind Of)

Insider Hints at Delay

Development Hurdles = Delays?

Next-level game complexity.

Take-Two Reports: GTA 6 Confirmed for Fall 2025

Rockstar & Take-Two: Still Saying 2025 (But Are They?)

So, Will GTA 6 Be a 2026 Game?

does

Gamers have been counting down to GTA 6 ‚Äôs 2025 release, but with a fresh insider leak, we might be in for some heartbreak. Rockstar‚Äôs been eerily quiet since dropping the first trailer back in December 2023, and now, rumors are swirling that the highly anticipated game might actually be delayed until 2026.A well-connected Rockstar insider, @Mvbrr, recently claimed that a 2025 launch is looking ‚Äúunlikely‚Äù based on recent reports. This tracks with the growing unease in the community‚Äîwhy has there been zero marketing updates since that first trailer?Rockstar‚Äôs past behavior isn‚Äôt exactly reassuring either. Remember how GTA 5: Expanded & Enhanced was originally planned for late 2021 but got pushed to March 2022? Yeah, delays aren‚Äôt new for Rockstar.Jason Schreier, a journalist with a solid track record, has also weighed in. While he hasn‚Äôt confirmed the delay, he did acknowledge that GTA 6 has missed internal deadlines. And let‚Äôs be real‚ÄîRockstar games rarely launch on time. Red Dead Redemption 2? Delayed. GTA 5? Delayed. It‚Äôs basically tradition at this point.The reason?GTA 6 is their biggest, most ambitious project yet, and pushing boundaries means running into roadblocks. On top of that, reports suggest content revisions are happening, particularly around sensitive topics, which could be slowing things down.Officially, Take-Two Interactive insists that GTA 6 is still on track for a Fall 2025 release. But let‚Äôs be real‚Äîif a major game is actually hitting in a year, the marketing should be in full swing by now. Instead, we‚Äôve got radio silence.The first trailer broke records, showcasing Vice City and the new Bonnie & Clyde-inspired protagonists, but since then? Crickets. No new trailers, no gameplay reveals, and no official updates. That‚Äôs not a good sign.For now, Take-Two is sticking to its 2025 release promise‚Äîbut history tells us to stay skeptical. Between insider leaks, development struggles, and Rockstar‚Äôs lack of updates, the possibility of a 2026 delay feels very real.The good news? If Rockstarpush the release, it‚Äôs probably to make sure the game meets their ridiculously high standards. The bad news? We might have to wait even longer to step back into Vice City.For now, we‚Äôre all just refreshing Rockstar‚Äôs socials like maniacs and hoping for an update soon. Will GTA 6 really drop in 2025, or is a delay inevitable? Only time will tell.
Article Summary: A well-connected rockstar insider, @mvbrr, recently claimed that a 2025 launch is looking ‚Äúunlikely‚Äù based on recent reports. Jason schreier, a journalist with a solid track record, has also acknowledged that gta 6 has missed internal deadlines. Rockstar games rarely launch on time.

Article Title: NHL Rumors: Brock Boeser Expected to Land Major Pay Raise in Free Agency
Article Text:
Image Via Getty

Brock Boeser All Set For A Big Market, With Offensive Steadiness

Canucks Not Loving Boeser Trade Offers

LIVE | Patrik Allvin Trade Deadline Media Availability

Even as the Vancouver Canucks fight for a playoff spot, Boeser's future hangs in the balance. The talented winger will be heading to free agency this summer following the expiration of his three-year contract worth $19.95 million. While his concentration is currently on a strong finish to the season, contract negotiations with the Canucks seem yet to be underway. The general consensus is that as ceilings go up in NHL salary structures, Boeser could receive a sizable pay rise on the open market. So, the next move could be critical for both parties.Even if Brock Boeser's offensive production has been down this season, he is lining himself up for a big contract in free agency. To quote Johnston, ‚ÄúWith the salary cap due to take a significant jump this summer, Boeser would jump from a $6.65 million average annual value to a $7.65 million AAV just by securing the same percentage of cap (8.06 percent) as he got on his last RFA deal with Vancouver in 2022." Basically, two forces are acting on this, one being the rising salary cap and the other the low supply of impact goal-scorers on the market.Boeser scored a career-high 40 goals and 73 points in the 2023-24 campaign but has been struggling this year, tallying just 38 points (18 goals and 20 assists) in 60 games. His numbers at present don't look terrific, but still, his goal-scoring ability alone will keep him in the mix for teams looking to add offensive flair.The Canucks looked into a trade for Boeser leading up to the NHL trade deadline, but GM Patrik Allvin was said to not be impressed by the offers on the table. In his comments, Allvin hinted there was a shocking lack of market for Boeser, adding that if criticized, ‚ÄúIf I told you what I was offered for Brock Boeser I think I would have to run out of here because you would not believe me."Since the deadline, Boeser's play has only deteriorated, with calendars recording just one assist and tallying a -6 rating in six games. Uncertainty looms over his future, which means the Canucks must choose to either stay with him at an inflated price or make plans to walk away.Also Read : Kiefer Sherwood Calls Out Jason Dickinson for Dirty Hit on Filip Chytil Boeser is a marked man during the playoff push by the Canucks, and his contract status is paramount. His next contract will be a big one, whether he stays in Vancouver or hits free agency. Until then, he intends to lead the Canucks in an equally crucial match against the Winnipeg Jets at Rogers Arena.
Article Summary: Brock boeser's future with the vancouver canucks hangs in the balance. The winger will be heading to free agency this summer following the expiration of his three-year contract worth $19.95 million. Gm patrik allvin was said to not be impressed by the offers on the table.

Article Title: Shantanu Naidu celebrates Holi with senior citizens through Goodfellows India, honouring Ratan Tata‚Äôs legacy ‚Äì "A beautiful celebration!"
Article Text:
Source: LinkedIn

Shantanu Naidu celebrates Holi with the elderly through his initiative Goodfellows India



Source: LinkedIn

Source: LinkedIn

Shantanu Naidu‚Äôs initiative sparks positive reactions for connecting generations



Source: LinkedIn

Shantanu Naidu‚Äôs emotional tribute to Ratan Tata



Shantanu Naidu‚Äôs bond with Ratan Tata shaped his commitment



Also Read |

Shantanu Naidu , the millennial executive who rose to fame for his stint as Ratan Tata 's personal assistant, recently posted adorable photos of him having an "intergenerational Holi" with senior citizens. Naidu, now promoted to General Manager and Head of Strategic Initiatives at Tata Motors, has always been passionate about social causes. Here, too, his observance of the festival of colours with older people is a reflection of his continuing love for uniting people from different generations.The organisation where Naidu spent Holi with the elderly is no other than Goodfellows India , a companionship organisation Naidu started. The aim of Goodfellows India is to offer a feeling of belonging and care to senior citizens who tend to live lonely lives because they lack family or loved ones. The organisation offers companionship and seeks to counter loneliness, giving a platform for senior citizens to feel connected and valued in society.On LinkedIn, Naidu posted pictures of the celebration, where older men and women celebrated the festival of colours, dancing and celebrating the occasion of Holi. He captioned the photo, "Colouring outside the lines of age. A Happy intergenerational Holi from Goodfellows India," showing the celebratory mood of the event and the pleasure of uniting different generations.The photos were followed by smiling faces of elderly people, some of them laughing, others dancing, as they participated in the joy of Holi. The festival was not merely about colours; it was a moment of togetherness and acceptance for people who otherwise feel left out because of age or loneliness.Naidu's occasion was greeted with mass praise on social media. Numerous users praised the effort as a lovely instance of empathy and commitment towards truly making an impact in the world of senior citizens. One praised Naidu's initiatives and said, "What a beautiful celebration! Your empathy and commitment at Goodfellows India are such an inspiration, Shantanu Naidu. Cheers to more colourful and fulfilling inter-generational connections."Yet another user commented, "This gesture is truly wonderful and a fantastic addition to society. Putting smiles on the faces of individuals who truly deserve them." The atmosphere of positivity around Naidu's gesture highlights how crucial social gestures that put a smile on others' faces, who are most of the time neglected or are lonely, really are.While Naidu's professional career is replete with milestones, one of the most significant things about his career has been his personal equation with Ratan Tata, the erstwhile Tata Group chairman. In spite of being decades younger than Tata, Naidu developed an extremely close rapport with him, sometimes acting as his personal assistant and trusted advisor. Beyond the domain of professional obligation, Naidu used to describe Tata as his "lighthouse," a guiding source in his life.After Tata's passing in 2023, Naidu made a moving tribute to his mentor, accompanying Tata's hearse during his last journey. In a touching post, Naidu wrote about his sadness and how much the loss hurt him. "The void that this friendship has now left in me, I will spend the remainder of my life attempting to fill. Grief is the price we pay for love. Goodbye, my dear lighthouse," Naidu posted.Shantanu Naidu and Ratan Tata‚Äôs bond began over 10 years ago when Naidu first joined the Tata Group in 2014. Naidu worked on several initiatives with Tata to improve the welfare of stray animals and elderly citizens. His commitment to giving back to society is reflected in the values Tata instilled in him, and this dedication continues through his work with Goodfellows India.Apart from professional achievement, the values and personal development of Naidu, imparted to him under the guidance of Tata, have made him an individual focused on kindness and community influence. As he carries out his initiatives for Goodfellows India, Naidu continues to leave his indelible mark on society in such a way that not one senior citizen shall ever be ignored or forgotten.
Article Summary: Shantanu naidu is the general manager and head of strategic initiatives at tata motors. He recently celebrated holi with the elderly through his initiative goodfellows india. The organisation offers companionship and seeks to counter loneliness, giving a platform for senior citizens to feel connected and valued.

Article Title: FBI has a ‚Äòhacker‚Äô warning for Gmail, Microsoft Outlook users
Article Text:
What the FBI said about Medusa ransomware



‚ÄúRansom demands are posted on the site, with direct hyperlinks to Medusa-affiliated cryptocurrency wallets. At this stage, Medusa concurrently advertises the sale of the data to interested parties before the countdown timer ends. Victims can additionally pay $10,000 in cryptocurrency to add a day to the countdown timer,‚Äù

The FBI and the US Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA) have warned Gmail and Microsoft Outlook users about a dangerous ransomware scheme . Earlier this week, the US government agencies issued a warning regarding Medusa, a ransomware-as-a-service software responsible for attacks since 2021, which has recently impacted hundreds of individuals. CISA reports that Medusa primarily employs phishing campaigns to steal victims' credentials. Some of the recommendations that the agencies offered to protect against this ransomware include patching operating systems and keeping devices updated, using multi-factor authentication for services like email and VPNs, using strong passwords and avoiding frequent password changesAccording to the advisory (seen by the news agency AP), Medusa developers and affiliates, known as ‚ÄúMedusa actors,‚Äù employ a double extortion strategy, encrypting victims' data and threatening to expose the stolen information if the ransom isn‚Äôt paid. Medusa runs a data-leak site that lists victims with countdowns to the potential release of their data.the advisory noted.Furthermore, CISA highlighted that Medusa developers and affiliates have targeted over 300 victims across various industries, including healthcare, education, legal, insurance, technology, and manufacturing since last month.Last week, the FBI also warned about a surge in "smishing" attacks targeting iPhone and Android users. These scams use fraudulent texts to steal personal and financial data. Cybercriminals have registered over 10,000 domains, fueling a fourfold increase in attacks since January 2025, putting millions at risk of identity theft and fraud, the previous warning noted.
Article Summary: The fbi and us cybersecurity and infrastructure security agency (cisa) have warned gmail and microsoft outlook users about a dangerous ransomware scheme. Earlier this week, the us government agencies issued a warning regarding medusa, a ransomware-as-a-service software responsible for attacks since 2021.

Article Title: iPhone 17 Air: Apple reportedly considered making iPhone 17 Air portless and slimmer
Article Text:
(Image source: MacRumors)

Apple iPhone 17 Air will be a port-free iPhone

What to expect from the iPhone 17 Air

A single rear camera instead of the dual-camera setup found in the iPhone 17 Pro models.

A lighter chassis made from new materials, possibly titanium or a thinner aluminum frame.

Enhanced MagSafe charging with faster wireless charging speeds.

An improved display with thinner bezels.

Apple iPhone 17 Air could mark the end of charging ports

Improve the durability of iPhones by eliminating entry points for dust and water.

Enhance device aesthetics and allow for an even sleeker design.

Push forward its wireless charging and accessory ecosystem.

Regulatory and consumer challenges

What‚Äôs next for Apple

Apple‚Äôs upcoming iPhone 17 Air is expected to mark a significant shift in the company's smartphone design philosophy. According to Bloomberg's Mark Gurman, Apple considered launching the device without a USB-C charging port but ultimately decided against it for this model. However, the company is reportedly still working towards a future where iPhones will be completely port-free. The iPhone 17 Air will serve as a precursor to this vision, featuring a significantly slimmer design. While Apple has been transitioning its iPhones from the proprietary Lightning port to USB-C, speculation continues regarding the timeline for a fully wireless iPhone.The concept of a portless iPhone has been discussed within Apple for years. Reports suggest that the company has been gradually moving towards a wireless ecosystem, with advancements in MagSafe charging and improved wireless data transfer speeds. According to Bloomberg‚Äôs Mark Gurman, Apple executives believe that if the iPhone 17 Air is successful, it will pave the way for completely port-free models in the near future.Apple supply chain analyst Ming-Chi Kuo had previously predicted that a portless iPhone would arrive as early as 2021, but technological and regulatory hurdles may have delayed its introduction. With USB-C now mandatory in the European Union, Apple may need to balance innovation with compliance before fully eliminating physical charging ports.While details about the iPhone 17 Air remain scarce, leaks suggest that it will feature an ultra-thin and lightweight design. Apple is expected to achieve this reduction in size by optimizing internal components, including a more compact battery and a redesigned logic board.Key rumored features of the iPhone 17 Air include:Apple has historically been a leader in eliminating hardware features before the industry catches up. The company previously removed the headphone jack with the iPhone 7, introduced Face ID in place of Touch ID on flagship models, and transitioned MacBooks to USB-C long before it became a global standard.By removing charging ports, Apple aims to:However, this transition may pose challenges for users who rely on wired charging and data transfer. Professional users who shoot high-resolution videos may find it difficult to transfer large files wirelessly without a fast alternative.A completely portless iPhone would need to comply with regional regulations, particularly in the European Union, where the Common Charger Directive mandates that all mobile phones support USB-C for wired charging. Apple could potentially circumvent this requirement if the device exclusively supports wireless charging.Additionally, consumer acceptance will play a key role in determining whether Apple moves forward with this change. Users who prefer the convenience of wired charging may be hesitant to switch to a wireless-only model, especially if charging speeds and accessory availability do not match current standards.The iPhone 17 Air is expected to be a stepping stone toward Apple‚Äôs long-term goal of a port-free iPhone lineup. If the model performs well in terms of sales and user adoption, future iPhones could follow suit, with Apple refining wireless technologies to fully replace wired alternatives.With MagSafe improvements and advancements in data transfer speeds, Apple is gradually laying the foundation for this shift. While the transition to a completely portless iPhone may not happen immediately, the iPhone 17 Air is a clear indicator of the company‚Äôs direction.Apple is set to unveil the iPhone 17 lineup in September 2025, where more details about the iPhone 17 Air and its potential impact on future iPhones will be revealed.
Article Summary: The iphone 17 air is expected to be a stepping stone toward apple‚Äôs long-term goal of a port-free iphone lineup. If the model performs well in terms of sales and user adoption, future iphones could follow suit. Apple is set to unveil the iphone 17 lineup in september 2025.

Article Title: NYT Connections hints and answers March 17, 2025: Check clues to solve today's puzzle
Article Text:
What is NYT‚Äôs ‚ÄòConnections‚Äô game?

NYT Connections hints for March 17, 2025

Yellow: A single narrow piece

Green: When you do whatever you want, without consideration for the rules

Blue: A vehicle, often with a flatbed or special storage container

Purple: Music groups

NYT Connections answers March 17, 2025

Yellow- Fiber, Strand, String, Thread

Green- Abandon, Freedom, Spontaneity, Unrestraint

Blue- Dump, Garbage, Monster, Pickup

Purple- Ben Folds, Jackson, Maroon, Mc

How to play NYT Connections

You will receive a grid of 16 words.

Your goal is to sort these words into four groups of four based on their hidden connections.

Connections may include:Synonyms or antonyms.

Shared themes, such as objects, professions, or word families.

Wordplay or shared prefixes/suffixes.

A new puzzle is released daily at midnight.

You can play the puzzle on the New York Times website or app.

Look at the grid and identify words that seem related.

Experiment with grouping words that share a logical connection, such as names of mythical characters, clickable items, or objects used in a specific context.

Select four words you think belong together.

Click the "Submit" button to test your group.

If your group is correct, it will be locked in, and its category will be color-coded.

If incorrect, you lose a life.

You start with four lives.

Making four incorrect guesses ends the game.

Sometimes, the game provides a hint that you‚Äôre one word away from forming a correct group.

Use this to swap and refine your selections.

Correct groups are categorized as:Yellow: Easiest to guess.

Blue and Green: Moderate difficulty.

Purple: Hardest, often involving complex wordplay.

The game records your streaks and overall performance.

Challenge your friends or share results to see who solves the puzzles fastest.

If you run out of lives, the game ends.

Return the next day for a new puzzle and continue improving your skills!

Strategies for tackling NYT Connections puzzles

Identify Obvious Groups: Start with the most apparent connections, like mythology or objects with specific features.

Use Process of Elimination: Cross off words as you place them into groups, narrowing the possibilities for the remaining categories.

Think Creatively: Some categories require outside-the-box thinking, like interpreting word segments or understanding cultural references.

Learn from Mistakes: Each incorrect guess provides clues. Use these to refine your approach for future puzzles.

Other NYT games to sharpen your skills

NYT Mini Crossword: A quick yet challenging crossword experience.

Spelling Bee: Build as many words as possible using a set of seven letters.

Wordle: Solve a five-letter word puzzle with limited guesses.

Strands: A unique 6x8 word search that uses zig-zag solutions.

The New York Times has carved out a niche in digital word puzzles with games like Connections, a daily brain teaser designed to challenge logic and language skills. The March 17 puzzle (#645) brought its fair share of challenges, requiring players to think critically to identify connections between seemingly unrelated words. Known for its clever wordplay and nuanced categories, the game continues to captivate enthusiasts. This article delves into the intricacies of the puzzle, offering hints, solutions, and insights to help players master this engaging game and improve their problem-solving abilities.Connections is a daily word puzzle from The New York Times designed to test your vocabulary and expand your word knowledge. With three difficulty levels‚ÄîEasy, Medium, and Hard‚Äîit offers a fun and engaging way to challenge your brain while boosting your language skills. Word enthusiasts are sure to enjoy this delightful gaming experience. Currently, NYT Connections is trending across social media platforms!The Connections puzzle tests players' ability to group words into thematic categories. Unlike traditional crosswords, this game requires pattern recognition, linguistic knowledge, and a touch of creativity. Each puzzle includes 16 words, which must be sorted into four groups of four, based on shared characteristics.The March 17 edition is particularly tricky, featuring themes that ranged from verbs to Greek mythology, requiring careful analysis and lateral thinking. With varying levels of difficulty across the categories, this puzzle is a treat for seasoned solvers and a challenge for newcomers.If you‚Äôve struggled with today‚Äôs puzzle or want to understand its nuances better, this article provides all the guidance you need‚Äîfrom subtle hints to full explanations.To assist players without revealing answers outright that you can use to start each category. Here are hints for the puzzle‚Äôs categories:These hints are designed to nudge players in the right direction without giving away the solution outright, preserving the thrill of solving the puzzle independently.For those who need a helping hand, here are the full solutions for today‚Äôs puzzle, along with detailed explanations:Understand the Objective:Access the Puzzle:Begin Sorting Words:Submit Your Groups:Interpret Feedback:Handle Lives and Mistakes:Watch for Hints:Color-Coded Groups:Track Progress and Compete:Game Over and Retry:Solving Connections puzzles can be daunting, but with the right approach, you can improve your skills:If you enjoy Connections, the New York Times offers several other puzzles to test your vocabulary and problem-solving skills:Each game offers a distinct challenge, allowing players to explore new ways to engage with language and logic.
Article Summary: Connections is a daily word puzzle from the new york times designed to test your vocabulary and expand your word knowledge. Each puzzle includes 16 words, which must be sorted into four groups, based on shared characteristics. The march 17 puzzle (#645) brought its fair share of challenges, requiring players to think critically to identify connections between seemingly unrelated words.

Article Title: Today's Wordle #1367 hints and answer: Check clues to solve puzzle on March 17
Article Text:
How did Wordle originate

Where can you play Wordle

How to play Wordle

If you guess an incorrect letter, it turns grey.

If you guess the correct letter but it's in the wrong position, it turns yellow.

If the letter is correct and in the right position, it turns green.

Answers will never be plurals.

Letters can appear twice or even three times in a word.

Wordle hints and answers today

Wordle hints and clues for March 17, 2025

The word starts with the letter 'L'.

It contains two vowels.

The word has 4 unique letters.

It is bane of all cows

Wordle, March 17, 2025: Word of the day

Today's Wordle word is ‚ÄòLASSO‚Äô.

How to play Wordle

Wordle FAQs

Wordle is a popular word puzzle game that challenges players to guess a five-letter word within six attempts. Developed by Josh Wardle, this simple yet addictive game has taken the world by storm with its easy-to-understand rules and daily challenges. Each guess provides feedback with colored tiles: green indicates the correct letter in the correct spot, yellow signals the correct letter in the wrong spot, and gray means the letter isn't in the word. Wordle‚Äôs mix of logic and vocabulary makes it a daily brain teaser loved by millions worldwide.The Wordle puzzle can be tricky to solve, which is likely why you‚Äôve found yourself here, struggling to crack today‚Äôs challenge. As always, today‚Äôs NYT Wordle was full of surprises, but don‚Äôt worry‚Äîwe‚Äôre here to help. Below, you‚Äôll find some helpful clues for today‚Äôs Wordle answer , and if those don‚Äôt do the trick, keep reading to discover the solution directly.Wordle was initially developed by engineer Josh Wardle as a thoughtful gift for his partner. However, it quickly gained massive popularity, turning into a global sensation with thousands of players engaging daily. The game's success inspired fans to create various spin-offs, such as the battle royale-style Squabble, the music identification game Heardle, and multi-word challenges like Dordle and Quordle.As its popularity soared, The New York Times acquired Wordle, and it became a hit on social media platforms like TikTok, where creators even livestream their gameplay sessions.Wordle isn't available as an app; it can only be played through a web browser. To play, simply visit the New York Times Games website.Originally hosted on its own site and created by Josh Wardle, Wordle was acquired by the New York Times in February of this year. One of the great aspects of Wordle is that it‚Äôs ad-free, allowing you to fully concentrate on the word-guessing game.In Wordle, the goal is to guess a new five-letter word each day, with up to six attempts to get it right.Wordle also tracks how many times you've played, along with your win or loss rate, as the game has become wildly popular for its winning streaks.Today‚Äôs Wordle promises a puzzle that tests your linguistic skills, likely to be decoded by many participants. To assist you in solving the puzzle, we've curated a fresh array of hints and clues for today's Wordle challenge.Whether you have cracked the code or are still working with the hints, it is now time to reveal the answer. Drumroll please, as we unveil the answer for Wordle.To play Wordle, visit the link https://www.nytimes.com/games/wordle/index.html and begin guessing words.Can I play past Wordle puzzles?No, Wordle is designed as a daily game with a unique puzzle each day. While you can‚Äôt play past puzzles on the official site, there are unofficial Wordle archives available where you can play previous games.How do the color-coded tiles work in Wordle?Green means the letter is correct and in the correct position.Yellow means the letter is correct but in the wrong position.Gray means the letter is not in the word at all.How many guesses do I get in Wordle?You have six chances to guess the correct five-letter word. After each guess, you receive feedback to help guide your next attempt.Can I play Wordle more than once per day?Wordle is designed as a daily puzzle, so you can only play one puzzle per day. The word of the day is the same for everyone globally, and once you complete it, you‚Äôll have to wait until the next day for a new puzzle.Can letters repeat in Wordle?Yes, repeated letters can appear in Wordle answers. Words containing duplicate letters can present more of a challenge when solving.Is Wordle available in other languages?Yes, there are multiple versions of Wordle available in various languages, including Spanish, French, and German. You can switch to a different language by finding the corresponding version of the game online.
Article Summary: The goal is to guess a new five-letter word each day, with up to six attempts to get it right. Each guess provides feedback with colored tiles: green indicates the correct letter in the correct spot, yellow signals the correct letters in the wrong spot, and gray means the letter isn't in the word.

Article Title: Grimes On Elon Musk's Children: Elon Musk's ex-girlfriend and mother of his three children Grimes shares the hardest part of parenting: I remember being a horror about ...
Article Text:
Grimes wrote,

"Why is putting kids to bed arguably one of the hardest things to accomplish. I remember being a horror about going to bed too What is the evolutionary reason for this Am I missing something? Like the story can't be too good or they get turnt and wake up - meaning it has to be an exercise in bad art. I deeply resent having to spend so much time with bad art in order to bore children to sleep - something seems morally wrong here - and like conceptually wrong. Is there a way to not wake them up with cool ideas or art and still get them to sleep? Is this common issue? I know I tortured my parents with this same thing - like demanding more and more stories and taking like an hour or more to sleep and getting up if they tried to leave the room before I was asleep."

She followed up in another tweet,

"To me this is the actual hardest part of parenting by far. By such a huge huge degree. My brain is not designed for this Hacks wud be appreciated. It seems like it's getting worse not better - as they get smarter they find more ways of thwarting."
Article Summary: Grimes wrote, "i deeply resent having to spend so much time with bad art in order to bore children to sleep" she followed up in another tweet, "to me this is the actual hardest part of parenting by far. By such a huge huge degree"

Article Title: Vikings release veteran center Garrett Bradbury after securing Ryan Kelly in 2025 NFL free agency
Article Text:
Credit: NFL.com

Vikings Release Garrett Bradbury After Signing Ryan Kelly



Ryan Kelly Signs His Contract with Minnesota Vikings

The Minnesota Vikings have officially parted ways with center Garrett Bradbury after securing the services of veteran Ryan Kelly from the Indianapolis Colts. Bradbury's release marks a significant shift in the Vikings‚Äô offensive line strategy as they aim to strengthen their interior line with experienced talent.Garrett Bradbury, who was selected with the 18th overall pick in the 2019 NFL Draft, had been a consistent presence for the Vikings over the past six seasons. He started all 17 regular-season games last year, including a playoff appearance, and has made 88 starts out of a possible 100 games since joining the team. However, with the Vikings signing Kelly to a two-year deal with $9.235 million guaranteed, Bradbury's departure became inevitable.The Vikings will designate Bradbury's release as a post-June 1 move, which will free up $5.25 million in cap space while leaving $814,000 in dead money for the upcoming season. His current cap figure will remain on the books until June 2, so the additional cap room will only be available after that date. The Vikings‚Äô attempt to trade Bradbury fell through as no team was willing to take on his $4.09 million salary.Following his release, Bradbury has already been linked to the New England Patriots. According to ESPN‚Äôs Mike Reiss, the Patriots, who recently cut veteran center David Andrews, have shown interest in Bradbury. Reiss noted on Sunday that while the Patriots were not interested in trading for Bradbury due to his salary, they could actively pursue him now that he is a free agent.Bradbury, who will turn 30 in June, has had an up-and-down career in terms of performance. He was ranked as the 10th-best center in the league by Pro Football Focus during the 2022 season. However, his overall performance declined over the past two years, ranking 31st and 33rd among centers. Last season, Bradbury earned the 14th-highest run-blocking grade among centers, reflecting his solid contribution in the ground game despite his struggles in pass protection.The release of Bradbury is part of a broader effort by the Vikings to reshape their roster through aggressive moves in free agency. In addition to Ryan Kelly, the Vikings signed guard Will Fries and strengthened their defense by adding Jonathan Allen, Javon Hargrave, and cornerback Isaiah Rodgers. The team also brought in linebacker Eric Wilson and offensive tackle Justin Skule for added depth.The Vikings‚Äô front office remains active in the market, as evidenced by their recent free-agent visit with cornerback Jeff Okudah. The former third overall pick in the 2020 draft has struggled with injuries throughout his career but remains a high-upside talent. After playing for Atlanta in 2023 and Houston in 2024, Okudah is looking for a fresh start, and Minnesota could offer him that opportunity.Also Read: NFL teams make history with unprecedented move ahead of 2025 Draft after 55 years Bradbury's departure signals a new era for the Vikings‚Äô offensive line, with Ryan Kelly expected to bring more stability and leadership to the center position. As for Bradbury, his next chapter may soon unfold in New England, where the Patriots are in need of an experienced anchor for their offensive line.
Article Summary: Vikings release center garrett bradbury after signing veteran ryan kelly. Bradbury had been a consistent presence for the vikings over the past six seasons. The vikings' attempt to trade bradbury fell through as no team was willing to take on his $4.09 million salary. New england patriots have shown interest in bradbury.

Article Title: Sustainability in action: Dubai‚Äôs roadmap to a net-zero future
Article Text:
Clean technology driving energy efficiency

Dubai Food Tech Valley ‚Äì Food Production Zone

Sustainable Agritech: Securing food for the future

Hydrogen and alternative fuels: The next frontier

Electric vehicles and the transition to clean mobility

The new energy economy

What lies ahead?

This article is contributed by Sindhu Kashyap.

It is a part of a featured content series on

.

Disclaimer: This article has been produced by Times Internet‚Äôs Spotlight team.

Dubai is rapidly advancing its sustainability agenda, positioning itself as a global leader in climate-conscious urban development. With the United Arab Emirates (UAE) committing to net-zero emissions by 2050, the emirate is undergoing a transformational shift in renewable energy, water conservation, and clean mobility. These developments are reshaping Dubai‚Äôs economic landscape and solidifying its role in the global sustainability movement.From electric vehicles (EVs) and green hydrogen production to smart energy grids and water conservation, Dubai invests in cutting-edge solutions to create a self-sustaining, green economy. The city is also attracting significant foreign interest, particularly from India, China, Europe, and the U.S., as companies seek to establish regional operations.‚ÄúWe are witnessing a significant push across three key sectors‚Äîelectric vehicles, water sanitation and hygiene, and alternative fuels,‚Äù said Chirag Gupta, Managing Partner at 8X Ventures. ‚ÄúThere have been multiple MOUs, LOIs, and high-level government discussions in these areas. Given the momentum, we expect capital to flow into these initiatives soon.‚ÄùA cornerstone of Dubai‚Äôs sustainability vision is the UAE Energy Strategy 2050, which aims to triple the contribution of renewable energy and invest AED 150-200 billion by 2030 to meet growing energy demand and ensure sustainable growth.This strategy aligns with the Paris Agreement and positions the UAE as a leader in the Middle East for carbon neutrality.Central to this initiative is the Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum Solar Park, which is set to reach a 5,000 MW capacity by 2030, making it the largest single-site solar park globally. Once completed, the park is expected to reduce carbon emissions by approximately 6.5 million tonnes annually.His Excellency Saeed Mohammed Al Tayer, Managing Director and CEO of Dubai Electricity and Water Authority (DEWA), said in a press release, ‚ÄúIn Dubai, we recognise the critical importance of energy transformation. We have adopted a resilient and integrated methodology, combining solar power generation with advanced storage technologies while continuously improving operations across the entire value chain.To further these efforts, His Highness Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum launched the Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum Solar Park, the world‚Äôs largest single-site solar park, in 2012. The solar park's planned capacity is set to increase from 1,000MW to 5,000MW by 2030. It houses a global Research and Development Centre and a Sustainability and Innovation Centre. DEWA has registered several international patents in electricity and water planning, production, transmission and distribution, alongside publishing Scopus-indexed research papers in international conferences and journals.‚ÄùApart from this, in 2016, Dubai launched the Al Sa'fat ‚Äì Dubai Green Building System, which classifies buildings such as Platinum, Gold, Silver, and Bronze based on their adherence to green standards. This system aims to encourage all developers to build toward a greener tomorrow, safeguarding future generations and enhancing the sustainability of the urban environmentBeyond energy and mobility, Dubai is leveraging agritech to drive sustainability and food security in the region. With arid climatic conditions and limited arable land, the emirate is investing in vertical farming, hydroponics, and AI-driven agricultural solutions to reduce water consumption and boost local food production.One of the standout projects is the Dubai Food Tech Valley, an initiative aimed at enhancing self-sufficiency by integrating research, technology, and sustainable farming practices. The city has also seen significant private sector investment, with companies like Emirates Crop One launching one of the world's largest vertical farms. Dubbed as ECO1, it produces over one million kilograms of leafy greens annually while using 95% less water than traditional farming.Craig Ratajczyk, the former CEO of Crop One Holdings, had earlier emphasised the company's mission and the role of their Dubai facility in a press notesaid - "It‚Äôs our mission to cultivate a sustainable future to meet global demand for fresh, local food, and this new farm is the manifestation of that commitment. This new facility serves as a model for what‚Äôs possible around the globe."By promoting controlled-environment agriculture (CEA) and reducing reliance on imports, Dubai is ensuring long-term sustainability while strengthening its position as a hub for agritech innovation.Dubai is also pioneering green hydrogen production, aligning with the UAE's goal to acquire 25% of the low-carbon hydrogen marketThis initiative is part of the National Hydrogen Strategy, which aims to position the UAE as a competitive producer and exporter of hydrogen.‚ÄúThe discussions around alternative fuels are substantial,‚Äù Gupta noted. ‚ÄúHydrogen, methanol, and other clean fuel solutions are actively being explored as viable substitutes for petrol and diesel. There‚Äôs extensive research happening, and Dubai is emerging as a key hub for these conversations.‚ÄùDubai is positioning itself as a regional hub for EV manufacturing, assembly, and distribution. Companies from China, the US, and India are in advanced discussions with the government about establishing EV production plants, tech centres, and distribution networks.‚ÄúSerious discussions are happening across the entire EV value chain,‚Äù Gupta said. ‚ÄúWe are seeing multiple government-level negotiations about setting up manufacturing hubs, R&D centres, and distribution partnerships. Dubai is actively working to build an EV ecosystem, and international companies recognise the city‚Äôs strategic location as a gateway to the wider Middle East and Africa.‚ÄùFor Indian companies, Dubai offers a lucrative market opportunity, but a transactional approach won‚Äôt suffice. ‚ÄúIf Indian companies want to succeed here, they must commit to the region,‚Äù Gupta emphasised.‚ÄúFlying in, making deals, and flying out isn‚Äôt sustainable. The UAE wants companies to set up production facilities, R&D centres, or corporate offices. The potential is immense, but companies need to be willing to integrate into Dubai‚Äôs economic landscape.‚ÄùAnmol Singh Jaggi, Co-founder, BluSmart, the premium electric mobility company that recently launched in Dubaihas said the UAE has been a game changer for mobility and sustainable solutions, setting a precedent for innovative urban development globally.Jaggi, also added, ‚ÄúThe Dubai market presents a highly attractive opportunity for BluSmart due to its potential for significantly higher margins and profitability compared to India. We identified a market gap in the premium limousine segment and an opportunity to tap into it through our core tenets of Quality, Reliability and Sustainability.‚ÄùDubai‚Äôs economic future is centred around sustainability, with a clear focus on clean energy, advanced agritech solutions, and smart infrastructure. The UAE has pledged AED 150-200 billion in clean and renewable energy investments by 2030 as part of its net-zero roadmapThe country has also invested approximately $16.8 billion in renewable energy projects across 70 countries and provided over $400 million in aid and soft loans for clean energy initiatives.The combination of supportive business regulations, sustainable building practices, and advanced technological infrastructure creates a conducive environment for the growth of clean-tech and agri-tech sectors in Dubai. Foreign businesses, including Indian entrepreneurs, can leverage these advantages to innovate and expand in the region.The integration of AI in energy management and the enforcement of green building standards not only reduces operational costs but also aligns with global sustainability goals, making Dubai a strategic hub for clean and agricultural technologies.Dubai‚Äôs sustainability initiatives are expected to accelerate further over the next decade. As the UAE progresses toward its Net Zero 2050 goal, government-backed funding, policy frameworks, and global investments in clean tech will continue to rise.‚ÄúFor companies looking at Dubai, this is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity,‚Äù Gupta concluded. ‚ÄúIf you align with Dubai‚Äôs sustainability vision and establish a meaningful presence here, the growth potential is immense. Dubai isn‚Äôt just investing in a greener future‚Äîit‚Äôs actively building one.‚ÄùDubai‚Äôs pro-business ecosystem and sustainability-driven policies are accelerating growth in the agritech and cleantech sectors, creating new opportunities for entrepreneurs and investors. With tax-free zones, R&D incentives, and streamlined regulations, the city continues to attract innovation-led businesses looking to scale.As trade partnerships expand, particularly with India, and strategic investments in green technology and sustainable infrastructure gain momentum, Dubai is solidifying its position as a global leader in sustainability-driven urban development.Sources:1. https://www.wam.ae/en/article/aq30tt6-uae-pioneers-responsible-and-sustainable-energy?2. https://www.thenationalnews.com/business/energy/2023/12/06/sheikh-mohammed-inaugurates-worlds-largest-concentrated-solar-power-project-in-dubai/3. https://mediaoffice.ae/en/news/2025/february/12-02/saeed-mohammed-al-tayer-highlights-dubai-global-leadership-in-using-ai4. https://www.dm.gov.ae/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/Al-Safat-%E2%80%93-Dubai-Green-Building-System-2nd-editionJan2023.pdf5. https://www.weforum.org/stories/2022/05/vertical-farming-future-of-agriculture/6. https://www.wam.ae/en/article/149dop1-dubai%E2%80%99s-production-green-hydrogen-reduces-4507. https://www.wam.ae/en/article/hszrhfof-suhail-mazrouei-reveals-details-updated-uae-energy8. https://decarbonisationnews.com/2024/08/driving-sustainability-forward-blusmarts-strategic-expansion-into-dubais-premium-electric-mobility-market/9. https://www.wam.ae/en/article/hszrhfof-suhail-mazrouei-reveals-details-updated-uae-energy
Article Summary: Dubai is rapidly advancing its sustainability agenda, positioning itself as a global leader in climate-conscious urban development. The emirate is undergoing a transformational shift in renewable energy, water conservation, and clean mobility.

Article Title: Meet Srikanth Bolla, Shark Tank India‚Äôs new judge, who is visually impaired
Article Text:
Srikanth Bolla stands as a prominent Indian business leader who currently heads Bollant Industries Private Limited as its CEO, co-founder and Chairman.

Srikanth Bolla on Shark Tank India

Who is Srikanth Bolla?



Srikanth Bolla's Business Venture



Stay informed with the latest business news, updates on bank holidays and public holidays.





' Shark Tank India ' has a new addition to its panel - Srikanth Bolla , who serves as the founder and chairman of Bollant Industries . Bolla announced this through his social media handles. He posted several photographs from the programme's set on Instagram with the caption, "To survive a pool of sharks, you need to become one yourself."One photograph captured Srikanth Bolla alongside Jeet Adani, whose father is the prominent industrialist Gautam Adani. Jeet currently oversees various segments within the Adani Group, including their operations in Airports, Petrochemicals, Digital ventures, Kutch Copper, and Defence & Aerospace sectors.On Instagram, Shrikanth Bolla expressed his views about entrepreneurship in India, noting, "To be honest, entrepreneurship in India has taken a very heartwarming boost because of Shark Tank. People at the show seemed poised to solve some age-old problems and some modern issues in society while being visionaries."He further addressed his fellow citizens, stating, "I will just say one thing to all my fellow citizens: Don't just think about your idea; act on it, or someone else will! Thank you for having me, Shark Tank India. This is just the beginning!"Describing how he received the opportunity, Bolla shared, "So yes, I got an opportunity to become a shark on Shark Tank India. Being on the set made me realize that dreams aren't just for thinkers‚Äî they're for the doers! It was a blast meeting all these accomplished entrepreneurs on the panel and the pitches made were very inspiring ‚Äî smelled innovation in the air."Srikanth Bolla stands as a prominent Indian business leader who currently heads Bollant Industries Private Limited as its CEO, co-founder and Chairman.Although visually challenged from birth, he has established himself as a successful businessman and humanitarian. According to an ET report, his achievements include becoming the first sight-impaired student accepted into MIT's Sloan School of Management. His enterprise, Bollant Industries, now boasts annual revenues surpassing $150 million and provides employment to more than 500 people.Also Read | ‚ÄòElon Musk doing amazing work, but‚Ä¶‚Äô: Why Sajjan Jindal believes Tesla won‚Äôt find it easy in India Born July 7, 1991, in the town of Seetharamapuram, Machilipatnam, Andhra Pradesh, he comes from a Telugu-speaking agricultural household. His parents, who worked as farmers without formal schooling, experienced considerable financial difficulties. His visual impairment presented significant educational challenges, particularly due to the lack of proper facilities for disabled learners. Even after achieving 98% in his Class XII examinations, he encountered resistance in advancing his education, the ET report said.Determined to pursue his studies, he initiated legal proceedings to defend his educational rights. Following a six-month court process, he succeeded in gaining college admission. When engineering coaching centres denied him entry for IIT preparation, he sought opportunities abroad, applying to prestigious institutions including Stanford, Berkeley, and Carnegie Mellon. His acceptance at MIT proved a crucial educational breakthrough.His accomplishments extend beyond academics into athletics. He competed nationally in blind cricket and international chess, while also engaging in baseball and swimming. During his MIT tenure, he established a digital learning facility specifically designed for visually impaired students.After finishing his education, he returned to India in 2005 and joined the Lead India Program as a Youth Leader. His work there focused on addressing poverty and unemployment, helping develop leadership qualities and employability skills among 800,000 young people.He established the Samanvai Center for Children with Multiple Disabilities in 2011. This initiative included launching a Braille printing facility to support educational needs of differently-abled students.His remarkable journey earned him recognition in Forbes' "30 Under 30" Asia list in April 2017, where he was among three Indians selected that year.Also Read | ‚ÄòYou are better off‚Ä¶‚Äô: Zerodha's Nithin Kamath shares SIP mantra amidst stock market crash doom and gloom Bolla and Ravi Mantha jointly founded Bollant Industries in 2012. The organisation, which received investment from the distinguished businessman Ratan Tata , produces areca-based items whilst creating job prospects for people with disabilities.The company prioritises environmental sustainability by converting municipal waste and soiled paper into environmentally conscious recycled Kraft paper. The firm also manufactures packaging items from reprocessed paper, creates disposable products from natural leaves, and transforms plastic waste into useful items.The inspiring life story of Srikanth Bolla has touched numerous lives. His biographical narrative was adapted into a Hindi cinema production titled "Srikanth", starring the celebrated performer Rajkummar Rao in the lead role.
Article Summary: Srikanth bolla stands as a prominent indian business leader who currently heads bollant industries private limited as its ceo, co-founder and chairman. He posted several photographs from the programme's set on instagram with the caption, "to survive a pool of sharks, you need to become one yourself" his remarkable journey earned him recognition in forbes' "30 under 30" asia list in april 2017.

Article Title: Some relief! Average cost of preparing vegetarian thali at home goes down in February, but chicken plays spoilsport for non-vegetarians
Article Text:
Vegetarian thali cost saw a 1% reduction year-on-year in February.

In February, the vegetarian thali saw a reduction in cost compared to the previous year, whilst the non-vegetarian thali showed an increase due to higher broiler prices.

The vegetarian thali saw a 1% reduction year-on-year in February, whereas the non-vegetarian thali registered an increase of approximately 6%:

The reduction in vegetarian thali cost was attributed to decreased prices of tomato and LPG cylinder

was attributed to decreased prices of tomato and LPG cylinder Tomato prices reduced to Rs 23/kg from Rs 32/kg, showing a 28% decrease year-on-year, due to 20% increased supply

LPG costs decreased by 11% year-on-year (to Rs 803 per 14.2 kg cylinder in Delhi from Rs 903) providing additional savings

The decline would have been more substantial if not for the increased prices of onion (11%), potato (16%) and vegetable oil (18%) year-on-year, says CRISIL.

Cost of preparing a thali at home (Source: CRISIL)



Stay informed with the latest business news, updates on bank holidays and public holidays.





In some relief for the common man, the cost of a home-cooked vegetarian thali declined year-on-year in February, according to CRISIL‚Äôs latest monthly indicator of food plate cost, RRR (Roti Rice Rate). The cost of a non-vegetarian thali, however grew approximately 6% due to rise in broiler (chicken) prices, the report said. On a month-on-month basis the cost of both vegetarian and non-vegetarian thalis came down.The calculation of an average thali's preparation cost at home by CRISIL considers input prices across different regions of India. Monthly variations indicate the impact on everyday household expenses. The analysis tracks price movements of essential ingredients including cereals, pulses, broilers, vegetables, spices, edible oil and cooking gas.The rise in non-vegetarian thali prices was primarily due to a 15% year-on-year increase in broiler (chicken) prices. Broiler (chicken), which constitutes approximately 50% of a non-vegetarian thali's cost, saw this increase due to previous year's low baseline when prices had fallen because of oversupply.Also Read | Q3 FY25 GDP grows at 6.2%; India sees 'highest growth in 12 years' in FY24 - top 10 data points to know Additionally, higher feed expenses, resulting from a 6% year-on-year increase in maize prices, contributed to the overall cost surge.During the month, both vegetarian and nonvegetarian thali costs decreased by 5% compared to the previous month. This reduction was attributed to fresh supplies causing price drops in onion (7%), potato (17%), and tomato (25%). Additionally, broiler (chicken) prices fell by an estimated 5% month-on-month due to reduced demand following bird flu concerns in southern India.
Article Summary: Cost of a home-cooked vegetarian thali declined year-on-year in february. The cost of a non-vegetarian thali, however grew approximately 6% due to rise in broiler (chicken) prices. The calculation of an average thali's preparation cost at home by crisil considers input prices across different regions.

Article Title: 'Digitalisation has helped boost farm, MSME lending'
Article Text:
Stay informed with the latest business news, updates on bank holidays and public holidays.





MUMBAI: SBI chairman C S Setty said that several initiatives taken by govt to formalise the MSME and agriculture sectors through digitalisation have enabled banks to lend to these segments. He noted that digitalisation has transformed these areas, allowing banks to develop innovative models that expand formal credit access to previously underserved sectors.Setty was speaking at the 77th AGM of Indian Banks' Association (IBA) on Sunday. The session was presided over by IBA chairman and Central Bank of India MD & CEO M V Rao , IBA chief executive Atul Kumar Goel . M Nagaraju, financial services secretary was the chief guest.Nagaraju said that banks have shown strong performance over the last three years, including in the past three quarters of the current fiscal. "Each bank also needs to identify its focus on building capacity and planning road maps for appropriate and timely capital raising and efficient allocation of resources besides striving to bring down inter-mediation costs," he said.In his address Setty said that banks play a critical role in financial inter-mediation and nation-building. He called upon IBA to facilitate the exchange of information from global institutions and agencies, share best practices, and create a pool of experts to support financial institutions.
Article Summary: Sbi chairman c s setty said several initiatives taken by govt to formalise the msme and agriculture sectors through digitalisation have enabled banks to lend to these segments. Setty was speaking at the 77th agm of indian banks' association (iba) on sunday.

Article Title: Elon Musk's Starlink likely to face spectrum tax
Article Text:
Stay informed with the latest business news, updates on bank holidays and public holidays.





NEW DELHI: Starlink is likely to face a spectrum tax in India, which had been abolished for terrestrial network providers, such as Reliance Jio, Airtel and Vodafone Idea a few years back, sources said. The tax, if imposed, will increase service costs for Elon Musk-run satcom venture in India.The move will be another challenge for the American satellite major, which is negotiating stiff compliance mandates related to internet suspension and interception. .Sources told TOI that Starlink, which will be allotted telecom airwaves through administrative allocation (in line with the new Telecom Law passed in Dec 2023), will need to cough up around 3% spectrum usage charge (SUC) on its adjusted gross revenue from the country."Since spectrum will be 'administratively assigned' to satellite operators instead of auction, SUC will be applicable, for which final rates are being worked upon," one of the sources said.This will mean that apart from 8% licence fee, that all telcos need to pay, satcom players will be required to shell out an additional charge for spectrum. "It may even be higher than 3%, though this is still being discussed."The matter related to the pricing of satellite spectrum, its tenure and other taxation is currently being finalised by regulator Trai. "Discussions within Trai are believed to have come to the conclusion that there is a requirement to mandate SUC for satcom players, since they will be allotted spectrum administratively at a pre-determined price," the source added.Trai is likely to submit its recommendations on the issue of satcom spectrum allocation soon, and these will then be considered by the department of telecom (DoT). After analysis of the recommendations, DoT may raise further queries on the matter with specific references. Once satisfied, DoT will take up the matter with the inter-ministerial Digital Communications Commission (DCC). After DCC's approval, it will be taken up by the Cabinet.In June 2022, govt had taken a decision to remove SUC for bandwidth that had been auctioned after Sept 15, 2021 across different frequencies.Sources said SUC will also be applicable for other satellite operators, such as Eutelsat One Web (where Airtel promoter Sunil Mittal has a stake) and Reliance Jio-SES (satcom JV between Jio Platforms and Luxembourg-based SES).
Article Summary: The tax, if imposed, will increase service costs for elon musk-run satcom venture in india. The move will be another challenge for the american satellite major, which is negotiating stiff compliance mandates related to internet suspension and interception.
